text: allaah hee hai jisane tumhaare lie dharatee ko thaharane ka sthaan banaaya aur aakaash ko ek bhavan ke roop mein banaaya, aur tumhen roop die to kya hee achchhe roop die, aur tumhen achchhee paak cheezon kee rozee dee. vah hai allaah, tumhaara rab. to badee barakatavaala hai allaah, saare sansaar ka rab
